tool_description: The world's largest UPC barcode database. Product data from 888+ million UPC, GTIN, EAN, ISBN13; 1.3m+ GLN & GCP licensees info.
name: Big Product Data
title: Big Product Data

api_list.name: GTIN-14 to GTIN-13 converter
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a GTIN-13 converted from a GTIN-14, up to 10 numbers per request (separated by commas).

required_parameters.name: numbers
required_parameters.description: 14 digit numbers, separated by commas, up to 10 per request

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://big-product-data.p.rapidapi.com/gtin14to13/10074031274690,10014616228205,10017183804568,10022000212624,10023400002013,10029419869395,10031009005168,10040000443282,10049029007802,10054400001713"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "big-product-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://big-product-data.p.rapidapi.com/gtin14to13/{numbers}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "big-product-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Barcode image in PNG or SVG format
api_list.description: Generate a barcode image based on provided GTIN (UPC, EAN, ISBN-13) in either PNG or SVG format.

api_list.name: Check digit calculator
api_list.description: Check digit calculator provides a list of GTINs with their corrected last check digit from your input (7, 11 or 12 digit numbers, up to 10 per request).

required_parameters.name: numbers
required_parameters.description: 7, 11 or 12 digit numbers, separated by commas, up to 10 per request

api_list.name: Lookup barcode registerer by GTIN (UPC, EAN)
api_list.description: Lookup information of the original registerer (currently active or otherwise) of a valid GTIN. Result may include GCP (Company Prefix), GLN (Global Location Number), company name, address and region.

api_list.name: Lookup barcode registerer by Global Location Number (GLN)
api_list.description: Lookup information of the original registerer (currently active or otherwise) of a GLN (Global Location Number). Result may include company name, address and region.

required_parameters.name: gln
required_parameters.description: Global Location Number (GLN), a 13 digit number.

api_list.name: Lookup barcode original registerer by Company Prefix (GCP)
api_list.description: Lookup information of the original registerer (currently active or otherwise) of a GTIN prefix. Result may include GLN (Global Location Number), company name, address and region.

required_parameters.name: gcp
required_parameters.description: GTIN prefix, a 5 to 11 digit number

api_list.name: GTIN validator
api_list.description: GTIN validator tells you whether if provided numbers are correctly composed GTINs. Each request supports up to 10 GTIN-8, GTIN-12 or GTIN-13 numbers.

required_parameters.name: gtins
required_parameters.description: Up to 10 GTIN-8, GTIN-12 or GTIN-13 numbers, separated by commas.

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "big-product-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Product data search by GTIN (UPC, EAN, ISBN-13, GTIN-13)
api_list.description: Look up product information associated with provided GTIN (UPC, EAN, ISBN-13, GTIN-13). Result may include: product names, description, brands, manufacturers, sizes, colors, features, nutrition facts, prices, etc, and a list of URLs online stores with URLs to their product pages, images, price, store specific SKUs and other identifiers (see example response).

required_parameters.name: gtin
required_parameters.description: A valid UPC / EAN / ISBN-13 / GTIN-13

api_list.code:

url = "https://big-product-data.p.rapidapi.com/gtin/850028009338"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "big-product-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
